### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (not present) and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(60.5, -61.5) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Pipe network at position(107.5, -34.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Pipe at position(107.5, -34.5)
-  Pipe at position(108.5, -34.5)
-  Pipe at position(109.5, -34.5)
-  Pipe at position(109.5, -33.5)
-  Pipe at position(109.5, -32.5)
-  Pipe at position(109.5, -31.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler or steam engine
-  Make sure to refuel the boiler with coal before using it
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to the boiler and has input liquid

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing a new entity

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent. 
Important variables assigned:
- inventory: {'transport-belt': 8, 'small-electric-pole': 1, 'pipe': 20, 'stone-furnace': 1, 'wood': 7, 'copper-ore': 20, 'iron-plate': 613, 'copper-plate': 5, 'copper-cable': 2, 'iron-gear-wheel': 2} (type: dictionary)
